Thank you:

All who  seed this series of 25 disk. It's a long list and large files.

I'm asking your help. 

Please... After you complete a download Leave it to seed until a couple more people can take your place.

I've tried off and on for more than a year to make this teaching course available.

This is my last run. 

I'll be off the net in a couple of weeks. 

It's up to you whether these torrents live or die.

BEFORE you put down money for any TEFL / TESOL course take 3 minutes to download and read:

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/4084616/Consider_This_TEFL_course.pdf

Help the helper...

Dave is retired now and no longer uploading or sending files via email.

Currently downloading this file from backed up email.

Will begin re-seeding later TODAY.

The demand for these files meets the needs of only a specific group of people, those interested in finding out exactly what TESOL is all about.

These file serve that purpose at no expense except for the time to download.

Please...

After you complete a download continue to seed until someone takes your place.
